The highest obtainable value is 5610.00000
You should explore 7 floors.
Here are the cells you should unlock on each floor(S=start, 1=unlock, 0=don't unlock):

You can also buy 23 pet levels to get a value that's 1130.00000 higher, while only losing an equivalent of 690.00000 value on buying pets.
You should explore 7 floors.
